summary: Feature request to formally validate public API modifications between releases using a tool in CI/CD. This would identify exported API changes and prevent accidental breaking changes in patch/minor releases and exposure of internal APIs.
userImpact: Users risk encountering unexpected breaking changes in patch/minor releases due to lack of API modification tracking.
proposedFix: Implement a CI/CD tool (such as Microsoft's API Extractor) to identify the exact set of publicly exported APIs and report changes relative to the appropriate baseline.
keyQuote: Use a tool run in CICD that: 1. Identify the exact set of publicly exported APIs 2. Reports changes in these exported APIs relative to the appropriate baseline
